text: Pierre-Guillaume de Roux (25 February 1963 – 12 February 2021) was a French editor. He worked with Arthus, Contrepoint, Revue des deux Mondes, Latitudes, Le Quotidien de Paris, L'Appel, . In 1985, he was appointed literary director of Éditions de la Table ronde. He was one of the founding members of Éditions Criterion of Média-Participations. de Roux died following a long illness on 12 February 2021 at the age of 57, thirteen days short from his 58th birthday. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Writers from Paris Category:French editors
title: Pierre-Guillaume de Roux
